title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: I don't understand the bug description. It seems to be related to the lack of scoped type hierarchy on binary projects.
OB: The scoped type hierarchy is not available when working with binary projects.
EB: The scoped type hierarchy should be available and functional when working with binary projects.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a binary project. 
2. Select a binary project. 
3. Press F4 key.
